<h3 id="X31399">X(31399) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {ANTICOMPLEMENTARY, BEVAN, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*(b+c)*a^3-(5*b^2+6*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+5*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31399) = 3*X(1)-13*X(5067) = X(1)-6*X(10172) = 9*X(2)+X(5881) = 6*X(2)-X(5882) = X(3)-6*X(3828) = 3*X(4)+7*X(9588) = X(4)+9*X(19875) = 2*X(5)+3*X(10) = 8*X(5)-3*X(946) = 14*X(5)-9*X(3817) = 6*X(5)-X(4301) = 7*X(5)+3*X(5690) = 11*X(5)-6*X(9955) = X(5)-6*X(9956) = 4*X(5)-9*X(10175) = 4*X(5)+X(11362) = 13*X(5)-3*X(22791) = 4*X(10)+X(946) = 7*X(10)+3*X(3817) = 9*X(10)+X(4301) = 7*X(10)-2*X(5690) = 11*X(10)+4*X(9955) = X(10)+4*X(9956) = 2*X(10)+3*X(10175) = 6*X(10)-X(11362) = 13*X(10)+2*X(22791) = 7*X(946)-12*X(3817) = 13*X(5067)-18*X(10172) = 2*X(5881)+3*X(5882)</b>
<p>X(31399) lies on these lines:
{1,5067}, {2,5881}, {3,3828}, {4,9588}, {5,10}, {8,7486}, {20,5587}, {30,31447}, {40,3832}, {57,31410}, {119,3841}, {226,18395}, {355,3526}, {382,19925}, {497,31436}, {515,631}, {516,3843}, {519,1656}, {546,5493}, {547,4669}, {548,10164}, {551,3628}, {632,28204}, {950,31452}, {952,19862}, {1125,5070}, {1210,15888}, {1385,16239}, {1482,4691}, {1483,15808}, {1512,6845}, {1572,31417}, {1588,31440}, {1703,31414}, {1706,31420}, {1737,18398}, {2549,31444}, {2551,31446}, {2800,3698}, {3090,3679}, {3091,28194}, {3244,11230}, {3525,19876}, {3528,5691}, {3530,4297}, {3533,30389}, {3545,7991}, {3576,19877}, {3579,3853}, {3617,5734}, {3624,13607}, {3625,5901}, {3626,5886}, {3636,12645}, {3654,3851}, {3656,5079}, {3671,10592}, {3753,20117}, {3855,5657}, {3856,22793}, {3858,28198}, {3859,28174}, {3911,4317}, {3918,5887}, {3919,5694}, {4015,24474}, {4197,15016}, {4292,9656}, {4309,10826}, {4314,12019}, {4342,10593}, {4413,5450}, {4668,10595}, {4678,16200}, {4701,10247}, {4731,12672}, {4745,5055}, {4848,7951}, {5056,7982}, {5068,31162}, {5071,11522}, {5258,6946}, {5325,6917}, {5722,31480}, {5745,6885}, {5795,6970}, {6256,26040}, {6260,6937}, {6738,31479}, {6861,12437}, {6881,24391}, {7705,24987}, {7738,31431}, {7765,31398}, {7988,12245}, {8582,10265}, {9575,31407}, {9607,31396}, {9657,24914}, {9671,10624}, {9948,18242}, {10246,19878}, {10915,24386}, {11374,14563}, {12005,18908}, {12368,15057}, {12512,17800}, {12571,12702}, {12616,12671}, {12640,24387}, {13605,20396}, {15178,19883}, {15696,28164}, {15712,28208}, {15717,31423}, {17575,17619}, {17578,18492}, {17606,31397}, {28236,31253}, {31441,31450}</p>
<p>
X(31399) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1698, 5818}, {3617, 8227}, {4668, 10595}<br>
X(31399) = reflection of X(16189) in X(13464)<br>
X(31399) = X(3091)-of-4th Euler triangle<br>
X(31399) = X(3843)-of-Wasat triangle<br>
X(31399) = X(15040)-of-K798i triangle<br>
X(31399) = X(17538)-of-3rd Euler triangle<br>
X(31399) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 10, 11362), (5, 11362, 946), (10, 3817, 5690)<br>
</p>
